title: go get batch-submitter Permission error

labels.name: P-unconfirmed
labels.description: Issue might be valid, but itâ€™s not yet confirmed

body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
I can't `go get` the batch-submitter go package

I have no problems with using other packages like the `optimism/op-bindings` package

**To Reproduce**
enter `go get github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/batch-submitter` in the terminal

**Expected behavior**
I expect to be able to use the batch-submitter package.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
```bash
casper@LAPTOP-0CAT7HLP:~/dev/blockchain/test/benchmark$ go get github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/batch-submitter
go: downloading github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/bss-core v0.0.0
go: downloading github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/l2geth v0.0.0
github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/batch-submitter imports
        github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/bss-core: reading github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/bss-core/go.mod at revision bss-core/v0.0.0: git ls-remote -q origin in /home/casper/go/pkg/mod/cache/vcs/2becda94dbc30fced0ea30f92846c098be3dec85b0240bb3f9e89a9da568f686: exit status 128:
        git@github.com: Permission denied (publickey).
        fatal: Could not read from remote repository.

        Please make sure you have the correct access rights
        and the repository exists.
```

If I am being dumb with git, please tell me
**System Specs:**
 - OS: Win11, WSL2
 - Package Version (or commit hash): v0.2.0

https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/b979d861879c74d6d38a0a7abdd75d267c1a0912/batch-submitter/go.mod#L5-L11

This is the problem, it's not possible to `go get` because it can't find `v0.0.0`.
